snippet.title: Schim - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
snippet.description:
Playing as the titular Schim, a little shadow creature, you're on the hunt for the human being you're the shadow of. Schim is a platforming game inspired by children's games with made-up rules, where you can only move within the shadows of objects in the world. Jump from shadow to shadow, and help other schims you meet along the way find the objects they belong to.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
